rows.label: qst200402_msg0001
rows.name: Are you alright? Are you hurt?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0002
rows.name: Y-Yes... I'm fine.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0003
rows.name: Thank you very much for helping me.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0004
rows.name:
Still, what happened for
you to get tangled up with
such dangerous people?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0005
rows.name: They were collecting a debt...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0006
rows.name:
You see, I accidentally injured a
person of high standing at my job.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0007
rows.name:
I had to take out a loan to pay
for their medical bills, but...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0008
rows.name:
It seems I borrowed from the
wrong people, and the interest
kept growing day by day...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0009
rows.name:
Instead of decreasing, the debt just
kept growing. I can't keep up with
payments even cutting living costs.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0010
rows.name:
I see... So that's why
they were harassing you.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0011
rows.name:
At this rate, I won't be able to
live, let alone make payments...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0012
rows.name:
I feel like there's no
point in living anymore...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't say that! If you
die, it's all over!

rows.label: qst200402_msg0014
rows.name: Nia is right.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0015
rows.name:
If you keep trying your
best to live, I'm sure
good things will happen.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0016
rows.name: It's too soon to give up on life.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0017
rows.name:
That's right. We'll help
you pay back the debt.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0018
rows.name: Everyone... Thank you so much...!

rows.label: qst200402_msg0019
rows.name:
For now, you look pale. You should
go home and rest for today.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0020
rows.name: Yes... I think I will.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0031
rows.name:
My house is nearby. If
there are any developments,
please let me know...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0032
rows.name: Yeah, you can count on us.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0033
rows.name:
I'm counting on you...
Well then, excuse me.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0021
rows.name:
...Alright, then. Shall we go ask
around about this loan shark?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0022
rows.name: ...Would you mind waiting a moment?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0023
rows.name: What is it, Vasara?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0024
rows.name: This is merely my intuition, but...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0025
rows.name:
I feel there is more to this case
than a simple civilian dispute.
There is something else at play...

rows.label: qst200402_msg0026
rows.name:
I would like to assist
in this investigation.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0027
rows.name:
It's unusual to hear you say
something like that, Vasara.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0028
rows.name:
Alright. Let's split up
and gather information.

rows.label: qst200402_msg0029
rows.name:
Once we have some information,
let's go to Ellenora-san's house
and discuss. Sound good?

rows.label: qst200402_msg0030
rows.name: Yes, understood.
